item.title: Bay Area Beogram 8002: Oscilloscope Measurements
item.description:
This document summarizes the functional testing performed on a Beogram 8002 turntable, using oscilloscope captures of critical signals as a reference for comparison with other Beogram 8002 turntables. The testing involved connecting test leads to six key points on the Beogram 8002’s main board: Position Sensor 1, Position Sensor 2, Detector Arm, Speed Sensor, Servo Motor Forward, and Servo Motor Reverse. Due to the oscilloscope’s four-channel limitation, the initial focus was on the servo motor and position sensors...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bay-area-beogram-8002-oscilloscope-measurements/
